## ControlOptions interface

Represents configuration options for all controls

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ControlOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [asyncValidators?](./dynamic-forms.controloptions.asyncvalidators.md) | AsyncValidatorFn\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Async validators for the control |
|  [clearValue$?](./dynamic-forms.controloptions.clearvalue_.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Clears the control value if true. Ignores initial value. |
|  [controlClass$?](./dynamic-forms.controloptions.controlclass_.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A custom class added to the anchor tag of the control component |
|  [disabled$?](./dynamic-forms.controloptions.disabled_.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true to require a value before the form can be submitted. Default is false. |
|  [validators$?](./dynamic-forms.controloptions.validators_.md) | ValidatorFn\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Validators for the control |
